Title: Object: Antoine: quel est le but de tout cela? Le diable: Il n'y a pas de but!
Series: La Tentation de Saint-Antoine: troisième série
Description: Plate 18: in the centre the face of the devil, in the background the saint meditating. 1896 Lithograph on chine appliqué
Curator's comments: This is a proof before the addition of the lettering.
Exhibition history: 2006 June-Sep, Walsall, The New Art Gallery, 'Odilon Redon: A Throw of the Dice' 2019, 11 April - 18 July, London, BM, G90a, 'Symbolist Prints'
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
